title: Leg Wound
text: Double damage and target's land speed is halved for 1d4 rounds

title: Grazing Hit
text: Normal damage and target is stunned for 1 round

title: Knockback
text: Double damage and target is pushed 1d6 squares directly away

title: Vulnerable Spot
text: Normal damage and target takes 1d4 ability damage of your choice

title: Bleeder
text: Double damage and 1d6 Bleed

title: Heart Shot
text: Triple damage and 1 Con bleed

title: Deep Wound
text: Double damage and target is nauseated for 1 round (Fort negates)

title: Ragged Wound
text: Normal damage and 1d8 bleed

title: Sucking Chest Wound
text: Double damage and target is exhausted (Fort negates)

title: Lodged in the Bone
text: Double damage and 2 bleed. This bleed requires a DC 20 Heal check to stop

title: Momentum
text: Double damage and +2 on all your attack rolls for 1 round

title: Pinned Arm
text: Double damage and one arm cannot move (DC 20 Str or Heal to be freed)

title: Punctured Lung
text: Double damage and target begins to drown 3 round later. DC 20 Fort save each round to end effect

title: Ventilated
text: Double damage and 2d6 nonlethal damage

title: Hand Wound
text: Normal damage and 1d2 Dex damage. -4 penalty on all rolls using that hand until healed

title: Pinhole
text: Double damage and 1 bleed. Target takes 1 additional bleed each round until healed

title: Perfect Strike
text: Triple Damage

title: Nerve Cluster
text: Normal damage and target is stunned for 1d6 rounds (Fort save each round to act)

title: Penetrating Wound
text: Double damage and ignore DR

title: Kidney Piercing
text: Double damage and target sickened for 2d4 round (Fort negates)

title: Achilles Heel
text: Normal damage and 1d2 Dex damage. Target's speeds are reduced by half until healed

title: Spinal Tap
text: Normal damage and -4 penalty on attack rolls, skill checks and ability checks for 1d4 rounds

title: In a Row
text: Double damage to target and normal damage to adjacent target

title: Blown Back
text: Double damage and target is knocked prone

title: Appendicitis
text: Double damage and target is poisoned (treat as greenblood oil)

title: Javelin Catcher
text: Double damage and 1d6 bleed if from ranged attack

title: Cheek Pierced
text: Normal damage and 1d4 bleed. Target gains 50% spell failure chance for verbal spells until healed

title: Calf Hole
text: Normal damage and 1d4 Dex damage

title: Painful Poke
text: Double damage and target can take only one move or standard action until next round

title: Pierced
text: Double damage and target is dazed for 1 round

title: Tenacious Wound
text: Normal damage and 1d2 Con damage. Target does not heal this damage naturally

title: Muscles Severed
text: Normal damage and 1d6 Dex and 1d6 Str damage

title: Infection
text: Double damage and target contracts filth fever (Fort negates)

title: Overreaction
text: Normal damage and target provokes attacks of opportunity from all threatening opponents

title: Spun Around
text: Normal damage and target is flat footed for 1 round

title: Eye Patch for You
text: Triple damage and 1d2 Con drain. -4 Spot, Search and ranged attacks until healed

title: Forearm Piercing
text: Double damage and target is disarmed (1 item)

title: Clean Through
text: Normal damage and 1d6 bleed and 1 Con drain

title: Surprise Opening
text: Double damage and one free attack against the target with a -5 penalty

title: Organ Scramble
text: Double damage and 1d6 Con damage

title: Deep Hurting
text: Double damage and target is fatigued

title: Tongue Piercing
text: Normal damage and 1 Con damage. Target gains 50% spell failure chance for verbal spells until healed

title: Shoulder Wound
text: Double damage and 1d2 Str and Dex damage

title: Left Reeling
text: Double damage and target takes a -2 penalty to AC for 1d4 rounds

title: Elbow pierced
text: Double damage and target drops whatever is being held (1 item)

title: Bicep Wound
text: Normal damage and 1d4 Str damage

title: Nailed in Place
text: Double damage and target cannot move (DC 20 Str check negates)

title: Guarded Strike
text: Double damage and +4 to your AC for 1 round

title: Right in the Ear
text: Normal damage and 1 Int damage and 1 bleed

title: Chipped Bone
text: Double damage and 1 Dex damage

title: Stinger
text: Normal damage and target is sickened for 1d6 rounds

title: Nicked an artery
text: Normal damage and 2d6 bleed
